Flexible scheduling for individual sessions
Use of modern technology in teaching and information presentation
Providing an enjoyable environment in children's circles with artistic activities to reinforce learning
Focus on psychological aspects and consideration of individual differences among students
We have an exceptional group of specialized Al-Azhar teachers

OBJECTIVES.TITLE: Objectives
ITEMS: Teaching Arabic language and proper reading rules
Teaching children Arabic and Tajweed in an easy way to instill love for their language and attachment to the Holy Quran
Creating a means to preserve the identity of our Arab children in foreign countries through their communication with us and receiving language and Quran sciences
Contributing to helping non-Arabic speakers learn and master Quran recitation
Helping parents in memorizing the Holy Quran for their children with proper Tajweed rules and correct pronunciation
Providing an easy way to learn and memorize through online lectures
Encouraging students to form study groups to motivate them to study and excel
Providing psychological support to our students to help them continue and maintain their religious identity
Online Quran memorization for residents in non-Muslim countries and helping them obtain online certification in Quran recitation
Raising awareness about the importance and virtue of learning Quran Tajweed, which some scholars consider obligatory for every Muslim
